statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sales_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, store_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY unique_products DESC;
SELECT store_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, store_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, price FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, base_price, discount, optimized_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE discount > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity >= 5 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT s.product_name, ps.base_price, ps.discount, (ps.base_price - ps.discount) AS discounted_price FROM sales_data AS s JOIN pricing_strategies AS ps ON s.product_name = ps.product_name;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, max_price - min_price AS price_range FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY price_range DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 5 AND price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT id, customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, min_price, max_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE end_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name='Product1';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, customer_id, total_price FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, discount_rate, start_date, end_date FROM pricing_strategies WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, city, state FROM retail_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT strategy_name, created_date FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM retail_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE created_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, status FROM iot_devices WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(trend_value) AS total_trend_value FROM sales_trends GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_trend_value > 1000;
